references.paper_title: The last-iterate convergence rate of optimistic mirror descent in stochastic variational inequalities
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant as it provides a comparative analysis of the last-iterate convergence rate of an important algorithm for solving variational inequalities, providing a benchmark for the proposed method's performance.

references.paper_title: Tight last-iterate convergence of the extragradient and the optimistic gradient descent-ascent algorithm for constrained monotone variational inequalities
references.reason: This paper presents state-of-the-art results on the convergence rate of extragradient and optimistic gradient methods for solving constrained monotone variational inequalities, serving as a crucial benchmark for the new generalized Frank-Wolfe algorithm's performance.

references.paper_title: Last iterate is slower than averaged iterate in smooth convex-concave saddle point problems
references.reason: This paper highlights the differences in convergence behavior between the last iterate and the averaged iterate for saddle point problems, which is directly relevant to the analysis of the generalized Frank-Wolfe algorithm.

references.paper_title: Frank-Wolfe algorithms for saddle point problems
references.reason: This paper provides a foundational analysis of the Frank-Wolfe algorithm for solving saddle point problems, which are closely related to the monotone variational inequalities considered in the current paper, establishing a crucial connection to a well-known class of algorithms.

references.paper_title: Extragradient method for finding saddle points and other problems
references.reason: This paper introduces the extragradient method, a fundamental algorithm for solving variational inequalities, establishing a historical context and a benchmark against which the proposed method's performance can be compared.
